nodes.text: Podracing Quarterly was a quarterly magazine about podracing, of which the Nosaurian journalist Clegg Holdfast was a contributor. Following the disappearance of the Xamster Podracer Neva Kee during the Boonta Eve Classic of 32 BBY, Podracing Quarterly spread rumors suggesting that Kee fled the Mos Espa Podrace Circuit in his Podracer in an attempt to avoid creditors.
